thread.title: Kim Kardashian and Kanye West go for lunch with kids in LA | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Kim Kardashian and Kanye West go for lunch with kids in LA | Daily Mail Online

author: Sarah Sotoodeh For Dailymail.Com
title: Kim Kardashian and Kanye West go for lunch with kids in LA | Daily Mail Online
text: Share 801 shares The mother of two rounded out her flawless look with her gold triangle necklace she's often seen wearing - from the Kanye West X Jacob the Jeweler collection. Kim opted to leave her long, dark brunette tresses sleek and loose; she shielded her makeup free face with black sunglasses. So happy: Kim was seen leaving the sushi restaurant with a smiling Kanye (pictured) She makes sweats look good! The 36-year-old starlet covered up her incredible curves; pictured with Kanye, daughter North, sister Kourtney Kardashian and her daughter Penelope Absolutely adorable! North and Penelope were snapped holding hands as they left the restaurant; they were followed closely behind by their family Saint looked adorable in his camouflage hoodie with matching bottoms, adding Yeezys - from Kanye's Adidas line. Kim held North's hand as they made their way to the restaurant. Her eldest child wore Kanye's Adidas Calabasas label; the toddler rocked an olive and black top with matching bottoms and her own Yeezys as well. In conversation: North and Penelope held hands after lunch Looking good: Kim hit the pavement in black and white sneakers while bundled up in her heavy winter coat Family: Kanye kept a close eye on his family; (from l to r) Kanye, Kim, Saint and Penelope Adorable: Saint looked adorable in his camouflage hoodie with matching bottoms, adding Yeezys - from Kanye's Adidas line Safety first! Kim put son Saint in his car seat before heading home Talented: Kim styled her black T-shirt tucked into loose bottoms, adding a puffy coat on top North - Kim's mini me - wore her dark locks into two buns on the top of her head. Kanye, 39, also kept it casual; he paired a grey hoodie with track bottoms and Adidas sneakers. The rapper, who rocked his platinum dyed locks, kept a watchful eye on his family as they made their way back to their cars. Last week, Kanye unveiled his Yeezy Season 5 range during New York Fashion Week. Devoted to her kids: The mother of two rounded out her flawless look with her gold triangle necklace she's often been seen wearing - from the Kanye West X Jacob the Jeweler collection She's so beautiful: Kim opted to leave her long, dark brunette tresses sleek and loose Genetically blessed family: Kim held North's hand while carrying her son Saint What a cutie pie: Her eldest child wore her dad's Adidas Calabasas label; the toddler rocked an olive and black top with matching bottoms and her own Yeezys as well Kim's older sister Kourtney Kardashian and her daughter Penelope, four, joined them for lunch. Kourtney, 37, chose the same color palette as her younger sibling. The mother of three sported a motorcycle jacket with matching leather bottoms. Staying close to mom: North wore her locks into two buns on the top of her head Stylish duo: Kim's older sister Kourtney Kardashian and her daughter Penelope, four, joined them for lunch She added a $25 MSFTSrep baseball cap - which is a lifestyle brand founded by Jaden Smith and Moises and Mateo Arias. Kourtney rocked black and red Yeezy Boosts while carrying the $1,910 Louis Vuitton red and black Palm Springs backpack mini. Penelope matched her mom, opting to wear identical Yeezys and a similar leather jacket. The four-year-old wore a red plaid top with black leggings. Coordinating in their jackets: Kourtney, 37, chose the same color palette as younger sibling Kim; pictured with her daughter Penelope Coordinating mother and daughter: Kourtney sported a motorcycle jacket with matching leather bottoms 'Thrilled to party': Kim shared a cute photo of daughter North (l) seated with Kourtney's daughter Penelope (r) Share or comment on this article 801
